name: 3D-Shooter
description:
3D-Shutter from Anani Bareyan with Assets from MSU.

Changes compared to the training version:

1. Added a new challenging level (Level 2).

2. Implemented 5 different sections with different enemies with sequential passage of sections.

3. The behavior of the enemies has been changed, they do not stand passively, but all attack with varying degrees of intensity.

Control keys: ASDW, mouse buttons for shooting, mouse movement for viewing, scrolling the mouse roller to change weapons.
